column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////While busy and loud normally aren't my thing
column2: this restaurant definitely became a must anytime in in the area. The spicy tonkatsu was very rich
column3: and filling. The chicken ramen was nice
column4: and a light classic. Even though it was so busy the night I visited
column5: our food didn't take long at all
column6: which was also because the staff is helpful. It's more than worth a small wait.
